text.english: I would have lost heart, unless I had believed That I would see the goodness of the LORD In the land of the living. Wait on the LORD; Be of good courage, And He shall strengthen your heart; Wait, I say, on the LORD!
text.arabic: لولا أنني آمنت بأن أرى جود الرب في أرض الأحياء انتظر الرب ليتشدد وليتشجع قلبك وانتظر الرب
